items.title: Honeywell: Puzzling And Continued M&A Ahead Of The Break-Up
items.description: Honeywell's recent acquisitions and divestments aim to boost growth, but upcoming split into Automation, Aerospace, and Advanced Materials adds complexity. Learn more on HON stock here.

items.title: Caterpillar: Diversification Without Diworsification; Home Depot Looks Healthy, So Do Others
items.description: Diversify Caterpillar holdings with tax-efficient strategies. Explore HD, LOW, and SNA for income replacement potential and strong dividend growth.

items.title: Fidelity Select Industrials Portfolio Q4 2024 Review
items.description: For the three months ending December 31, 2024, the industrials sector, as measured by the MSCI U.S. IMI Industrials 25/50 Index, returned -1.72%. Read more here.
